officer as of April 4, handing the reins to Google co-founder Larry Page, who will become the central figure in day-to-day operations. Mr. Eric Schmidt will take the title of executive chairman, which entails a focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. Perhaps the most important aspect of Mr. Eric Schmidt 's new job will be keeping government bodies at bay, as Google's dominance attracts more attention from regulatory authorities. , a game in which the Eagles trailed by 21 points in the fourth quarter.`` Michael Vick has great instincts. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point,'' Eagles offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game. Last month, Michael Vick signed his first paid endorsement contract since his release from prison,
